course.subject: FINA
course.name: Family Office
course.description: Family office, if used properly, can be a powerful tool for the preservation of family wealth, family harmony, as well as family legacy and values. As the number of billionaires grows in Asia in the past decade, the need for setting up family office has been increasing. This course will provide students with a comprehensive and most up-to-date understanding of family office, as well as insidersâ€™ view and practical aspects of family office. For university students who are about to graduate and are interested in entering into family office related sectors, having an in-depth understanding of family office will definitely help them better prepared for the future.
course.prerequisites: FINA 2203 OR FINA 2303
